words.definition: The ability to express ideas clearly.
words.arabic_definition: القدرة على التعبير عن الأفكار بوضوح.

words.definition: Expressing ideas clearly with few words.
words.arabic_definition: التعبير عن الأفكار بوضوح باستخدام كلمات قليلة.

example.en: Conciseness is a mark of effective speakers.
example.ar: الإيجاز سمة من سمات المتحدثين الفعالين.

words.definition: The manner in which words are spoken.

example.en: He adjusted his tone to suit the audience.

words.definition: The quality of being precise and exact.

example.en: The precision of her argument was impressive.

words.definition: Placing special importance on certain words.

example.en: He used emphasis to highlight the key point.

words.definition: The ability to speak smoothly and effectively.

example.en: Fluency allows ideas to flow naturally.
example.ar: تمكّن الطلاقة الأفكار من التدفق بشكل طبيعي.

words.definition: The ability to capture and maintain attention.

example.en: Her engagement with the audience was captivating.

words.definition: The quality of being logical and consistent.

example.en: Coherence is vital for making a strong argument.

words.definition: Expressing thoughts and needs clearly and confidently.
words.arabic_definition: التعبير عن الأفكار والاحتياجات بوضوح وثقة.

example.en: Assertiveness is key to effective negotiations.
example.ar: الحزم عنصر رئيسي في التفاوض الفعال.

words.definition: The manner in which a speech is presented.

example.en: Good delivery can make a simple speech compelling.
example.ar: الإلقاء الجيد يمكن أن يجعل خطابًا بسيطًا مؤثرًا.
